attributes.action: prevent eviction of Palestinian individuals from Sheikh Jarrah, East Jerusalem
attributes.additional_details: We cannot only develop progressive realisation of human rights with in the west, there needs to be more foreign policies aimed at helping developing and suffering countries to establish the rights we as individuals in the west take for granted.
attributes.background: Attempt to do more than just a statement, either enforcing sanctions upon Israeli government through boycotting foreign trade with them and removing the British consulate in the country. The conflict between Palestine and Israel will never reach a consensus unless an external mediator interferes

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/585498
